titleStmt.title: Pegiama or The vertues of, and way how to use the minerall and medicinall-water at Peterhead in Scotland within the shire of Aberdene: whose latitude is 57. degrees 43. minuts: longitude 22. degrees 40. minuts. This being the compend of a peece, written anno 1636. by A. M. the student, now M.D. & P. in A. R. Aberdon.
Pedax petreia. Abridgements.
titleStmt.author: Mure, Andrew, M.D.

titleStmt.title: Pegiama or The vertues of, and way how to use the minerall and medicinall-water at Peterhead in Scotland within the shire of Aberdene: whose latitude is 57. degrees 43. minuts: longitude 22. degrees 40. minuts. notesStmt.note: First word of title transcribed from the Greek.
